alert.note: Alert for Dundy; Hitchcock; Red Willow (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 07 at 9:08PM CDT until April 08 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING FOR THURSDAY APRIL 7 HAS EXPIRED FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 001, 002, 003, 004, 013, 014, 015, 016, 027, 028, 029, 041, 042, 079, 080, 081, 252, 253, AND 254... The Red Flag Warning for Thursday has been allowed to expire. RH values are coming up as temperatures drop and winds are lowering across the area. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 001, 002, 003, 004, 013, 014, 015, 016, 027, 028, 029, 041, 042, 079, 080, 081, 252, 253, AND 254... * Affected Area...In Colorado...Fire Weather Zone 252 Yuma... Fire Weather Zone 253 Kit Carson and Fire Weather Zone 254 Cheyenne. In Kansas...Fire Weather Zone 001 Cheyenne...Fire Weather Zone 002 Rawlins...Fire Weather Zone 003 Decatur... Fire Weather Zone 004 Norton...Fire Weather Zone 013 Sherman... Fire Weather Zone 014 Thomas...Fire Weather Zone 015 Sheridan... Fire Weather Zone 016 Graham...Fire Weather Zone 027 Wallace... Fire Weather Zone 028 Logan...Fire Weather Zone 029 Gove...Fire Weather Zone 041 Greeley and Fire Weather Zone 042 Wichita. In Nebraska...Fire Weather Zone 079 Dundy...Fire Weather Zone 080 Hitchcock and Fire Weather Zone 081 Red Willow. * Timing...From noon MDT / 1 PM CDT through 7 PM MDT / 8 PM CDT. * Winds...Northwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 14 percent. * Temperatures...Mid 50s to around 60. * Impacts...Any fires that start could have extreme fire behavior and spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not advised.
info.instruction: Avoid creating any sparks, this includes from chains hanging off of vehicles.
